mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT GU ,NX, NY FROM AREA WHERE SI = #{selectsi} AND GU IS NOT NULL AND DONG is null ORDER BY GU ASC
SELECT DISTINCT GU, DONG ,NX, NY FROM AREA WHERE GU = #{selectgu} AND DONG IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DONG ASC

SELECT H.HOSPITAL_NO, H.HOS_NAME, H.HOS_ADDRESS, H.PHONE, MAX(A.GU) AS GU, H.NX, H.NY, MAX(F.FAVORITE_ID) AS FAVORITE_ID FROM ANIMAL_HOSPITAL_INFO H LEFT JOIN FAVORITES F ON H.HOSPITAL_NO = F.HOSPITAL_NO AND F.USER_ID = #{userId} LEFT JOIN AREA A ON H.HOS_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || A.GU || '%' WHERE 1=1
AND H.HOS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND A.GU = #{selectgu} AND A.GU IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY H.HOSPITAL_NO, H.HOS_NAME, H.HOS_ADDRESS, H.PHONE, H.NX, H.NY

SELECT A.* ,F.*, p.* FROM FAVORITES F LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_HOSPITAL_INFO A ON F.HOSPITAL_NO = A.HOSPITAL_NO LEFT JOIN PARTNER_DETAIL P ON P.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID = F.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID WHERE F.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITES (FAVORITE_ID, HOSPITAL_NO, USER_ID) VALUES (FAVORITES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hospitalNo}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO FAVORITES (FAVORITE_ID, PARTNER_DETAIL_ID, USER_ID) VALUES (FAVORITES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{partnerdetailId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT F.*, A.HOSPITAL_NO, A.HOS_NAME, A.HOS_ADDRESS, A.PHONE, A.NX, A.NY FROM FAVORITES F LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_HOSPITAL_INFO A ON F.HOSPITAL_NO = A.HOSPITAL_NO WHERE F.USER_ID = #{userId} and A.HOSPITAL_NO is not null UNION SELECT F.*, P.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID, P.NAME, P.ADDRESS, P.PHONE_NUMBER, P.NX, P.NY FROM FAVORITES F LEFT JOIN PARTNER_DETAIL P ON F.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID = P.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID WHERE F.USER_ID = #{userId} and F.PARTNER_DETAIL_ID is not null

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PARTNER_DETAIL WHERE 1=1
AND CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}

select * from partner_detail where 1=1
and (name like '%' || #{searchkeyword} || '%' or address like '%' || #{searchkeyword} || '%')
order by partner_detail_id desc
offset #{page} rows fetch next #{pagesize} rows only
